name: Sector 452
description: Sector 452 is a futuristic low poly shooter that takes place in the year 2058.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or higher (64Bit ONLY) Processor: Intel Celeron 1.86Ghz or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX, AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 400 MB available space Additional Notes: Minimum system requirements can/will change during the development of the game.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
